answers.answer: Hi there. I have been having the same problem with people not answering my requests for help.Anyway, I`ll try to get you thinking, okay?You said that your urin has a strange odor, right? It sounds like you might have a Urinary-tract-infection. Do you have any burning sensations along with the odor? Is your urin cloudy or dark in color? If I were you I`d definetly get tested for a U.T.I. as well as for a stone. I hope I was of some help. Good luck to you my friend.

HiWelcome to the forum!Strange odor in urine with increased frequency is seen in UTI and in diabetes. UTI including the STDs have been ruled out in your case. Then test for diabetes and see—fasting blood sugar, two hours after food and glucose tolerance test. Diabetes insipidus too should be looked into.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I have been having problem with urination.i will explain below for any typical day that i pass these days .i wake up at 6 and  head out out for my job at 630. i am often very tired when i wake up.when i arive  at my ofice  asround 730 i am already having  an intense pressure around my groin area  and a bit pain in my penis .so i urinate again , an hour later  i feel same  issue and and  go  again for urinate. then around  10   am   again . After my lunch break (12)  i  urinate again and  drink more  water . then i start feeling better , but  during  the  day i often feel very  sharp  pain in my  arms  all  day (it is  like  bursts of pain which goes away as well . i had  myself  checked  for  any STD  but  doctor  said  nothinng  positive (no bacteria).There is  very wierd  smell that i  feel  as well  during the day .I  work in a office  and  sit straight   in  chair  all  day which  leads  to  some  neck  pain as well.Sorry for  the long post   but can  anyone relate to  this .Will appreciate  any feedback .
title: Urge to pee and pain
